cq2rgk65s3sB7DaCdYRyqBuwkNc5Yp2f6A1bT"]}},"version":1}

params.crossChainController: address of current network message controller (cross chain controller or same chain controller)
params.governance: address of the linked governance contract
params.startVotingGasLimit: gas limit for "Start voting" bridging tx
params.votingMachine: address where the proposal votes will happen. Can be same or different chain

returns._0: proposalId, forVotes, againstVotes from the decoded message

params.blockHash: hash of the block on L1 when the proposal was activated for voting
params.proposalId: id of the proposal bridged to start the vote on
params.votingDuration: duration in seconds of the vote

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

receiveCrossChainMessage(address,uint256.details: pushes the voting result and queues the proposal identified by proposalId

params.message: bytes bridged containing the desired information
params.originChainId: id of the chain where the message originated
params.originSender: address of the sender of the bridged message

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CROSS_CHAIN_CONTROLLER().notice: gets the address of the CrossChainController deployed on current network

GOVERNANCE().notice: gets the address of the connected governance

VOTING_MACHINE().notice: gets the address of the voting machine on the destination network

VOTING_MACHINE_CHAIN_ID().notice: get the chain id where the voting machine which is deployed

decodeMessage(bytes).notice: method to decode a message from from voting machine chain

forwardStartVotingMessage(uint256,bytes3.notice: method to bridge the vote configuration to voting chain, so a vote can be started.

getStartVotingGasLimit().notice: method to get the gas limit for "Start voting" bridging tx

receiveCrossChainMessage(address,uint256.notice: method called by CrossChainController when a message has been confirmed

setStartVotingGasLimit(uint128).notice: method to set the gas limit for "Start voting" bridging tx

documentation.text:
@inheritdoc IBaseReceiverPortal
 @dev pushes the voting result and queues the proposal identified by proposalId

@notice method to update the _startVotingGasLimit
 @param gasLimit the new gas limit
